column1: # Description: Land status of water supply catchments. One of "protected"
# Comments: "Protected" means catchment land is closed to other land uses (e.g.
column2: agriculture) and may be owned by the water supply authority specficically for conservation purposes; "managed" means human activities in the catchment are regulated to safeguard water supplies
column3: but the authority has limited ownership or ability to manage those lands.
